RelatedSentence: Officials with the Metropolitan Nashville Police Department said the victim was shot on South 6th Street near Shelby Avenue just before midnight Sunday .
Police said there were no witnesses to the shooting , and no suspects have been identified .
Anyone with information was asked to call Crime Stoppers at ( 615 ) 74 - CRIME .
